name: blogs
description: stupid blog thing written with react and redux that keeps the posts as markdown files and renders them on the client and the server
author: chee <chee@snaek.org> (https://snaek.org/)

scripts.serve: npm run build; rm build/index.html; mv build/static/js/main.*.js build/static/js/main.js; NODE_ENV=production babel-node src/server
